heading: HR00280
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEES ON JUSTICE; REVISIONS OF LAWS; AND OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO REVIEW, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE IMPLEMENTATION OF REPUBLIC ACT 10592 WITH THE END IN VIEW OF AMENDING THE SAME IN ORDER TO ENSURE THAT THOSE PRISONERS WHO TRULY DESERVE TO BE THE BENEFICIARIES OF THE LAW SHALL BE GRANTED ACCORDINGLY
status: Pending with the Committee on JUSTICE since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00280
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEES ON JUSTICE; REVISIONS OF LAWS; AND OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO REVIEW, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE IMPLEMENTATION OF REPUBLIC ACT 10592 WITH THE END IN VIEW OF AMENDING THE SAME IN ORDER TO ENSURE THAT THOSE PRISONERS WHO TRULY DESERVE TO BE THE BENEFICIARIES OF THE LAW SHALL BE GRANTED ACCORDINGLY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : YAP, ERIC G.
DATE FILED : 2019-08-29
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE ON 2019-11-27
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2019-09-04;
